sentences.en: A quick pulse often denotes fever.
sentences.cn: 脉搏跳得快常表示发烧.

sentences.en: Ainslie's pulse quickened in alarm.
sentences.cn: 由于惊恐，安斯利的脉搏加快了。

sentences.en: Colored lights pulsed in time to the music.
sentences.cn: 彩灯随着音乐节拍闪动。

sentences.en: He claims to have his finger on the pulse of the industry.
sentences.cn: 他声称该对行业了如指掌。

sentences.en: He'd taken her pulse and made a guess at her blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 他给她把过脉，估量了她的血压。

sentences.en: Her pulse raced (= beat very quickly ) with excitement.
sentences.cn: 她激动得脉搏急速跳动。

sentences.en: His breathing was shallow and his pulse was weak .
sentences.cn: 他呼吸很浅，脉搏微弱。

sentences.en: His breathing was shallow and his pulse was weak.
sentences.cn: 他呼吸很浅，脉搏微弱。

sentences.en: His pulse is low, but his heart is still active.
sentences.cn: 他脉搏很弱, 但心脏还跳着.

sentences.en: Most people's pulse rate is more than 70 beats per minute.
sentences.cn: 大多数人的脉率都在每分钟70次以上.

sentences.en: She felt his neck. There was no pulse.
sentences.cn: 她摸了摸他的颈部，没有脉搏。

sentences.en: She felt the blood pulsing through her veins .
sentences.cn: 她觉得血液冲击着自己的血管。

sentences.en: The child's pulse is now even.
sentences.cn: 孩子的脉搏现在稳定了.

sentences.en: the distant pulse of a steel band
sentences.cn: 远处钢鼓乐队传来的鼓点声。

sentences.en: The doctor felt my pulse and looked down my throat.
sentences.cn: 大夫摸了摸我的脉,又瞧了瞧我的嗓子.

sentences.en: The patient has a weak pulse.
sentences.cn: 这位病人脉搏很弱.

sentences.en: The patient's pulse quickened.
sentences.cn: 病人的脉搏加快了.

sentences.en: The politician was able to take the pulse of the grassroots voters without becoming overly absorbed.
sentences.cn: 这位政治家可以不费太多心力就把其选民的心态摸清

sentences.en: The pulse is usually timed in micro-seconds.
sentences.cn: 脉冲通常以微秒计。

sentences.en: The pulse throbbed steadily.
sentences.cn: 脉搏跳得平稳.

sentences.en: They made frequent checks on his respiration, pulse and blood.
sentences.cn: 他们经常检查他的呼吸 、 脉搏和血液.

sentences.en: They took my pulse, took my blood pressure, and X-rayed my jaw.
sentences.cn: 他们给我量了脉搏、血压，还给我的下颌拍了X光片。

sentences.en: This radar is operated by an electronic pulse.
sentences.cn: 这台雷达依靠电子脉冲来操作.

words.tran_cn: 脉冲的；跳动的；脉冲调制的
颤动；有规律地跳动（pulsate的现在分词）
使跳动；使摆动（pulse的过去分词）
搏动；悸动；有规律地跳动

phrases.tran_cn: 脉冲频率；脉率；脉搏率；脉冲重复频率
脉冲宽度；脉冲持续时间
[计]脉冲调制；脉宽灯；脉冲间隔灯
判断意向：判断（例如，政治选民）的倾向或见解

trans.tran_cn: 脉搏，[无线电]（电磁波等）脉动，活力，有节奏的跳动（或拍打）
trans.tran_en: the regular beat that can be felt, for example at your wrist, as your heart pumps blood around your body
to move or flow with a steady quickbeat or sound
to move or flow with a steady quickbeat or sound

trans.tran_cn: 使跳动，有节奏地驱动（机器等），[电子学]施以脉冲，[无线电]脉冲地调节（电磁波）
